Lyric:

[00:41.95]
[00:44.60]You know that I'll be waiting for you darling
[00:50.34]Even if I'll have to wait forever for you

[01:04.72]
[01:07.01]Cause you're a keeper
[01:09.81]That's what you are
[01:12.85]You are the sweetest thing
[01:15.82]Ever happening to me

[01:30.28]
